com.ltsllc.miranda.network

Class Network

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ltsllc.miranda.Subsystem
      • com.ltsllc.miranda.Consumer
        • com.ltsllc.miranda.network.Network
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparer, java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MinaNetwork

    public abstract class Network
extends Consumer
    This class takes care of mapping from integer handles to Handle objects.

      • panic

        public boolean panic(Panic panic)
        Something Very Bad happend. Decide if we should shut down.
        Parameters:
        panic - The problem that caused the panic
        Returns:
        true if we should shut down, false otherwise

      • forceDisconnect

        public void forceDisconnect(int handleID)
        Close the connection, without sending a sign-off.
        Parameters:
        handleID - The handle to disconnect from.

      • newConnection

        public int newConnection(Handle handle)
        This is called when the ConnectionListener gets a new connection.

        The handle rturned can be used in susequent SendMessageMessage and CloseMessages.

        Parameters:
        handle - The new connection.
        Returns:
        The handle for the new connection.
